results.name: Fomo3D
results.description: Fomo3D is an ironic jab at the cryptocurrency ICO
results.fullDescription:
Fomo3D is an ironic jab at the cryptocurrency ICO space, putting every player in the terrifying and tempting position to Exit Scam everything and run away with massive life-changing amounts of real Ethereum.

You should take it.

Made by Team JUST as a 100% trustless library of smart contracts. Fomo3D is intentionally designed so that developers  have no access to the funds or influence on the rounds. 
The game runs entirely on human greed, to the profit of everyone playing.

results.fullDescription: Platypus is a game of speed and strength. It is a series of never ending rounds, 10 people playing against each other at a time. You can also buy P4RTY tokens on exchange to boost your strength, potentially at less than mint price (0.0001 ETH)!

results.name: CryptoCanvas
results.description: CryptoCanvas allows you to create, trade and colle
results.fullDescription:
CryptoCanvas allows you to create, trade and collect community generated artwork. For that we have developed a marketplace where new and existing paintings will be auctioned.

Every painter will receive a reward from each transaction based on their contribution to the drawing (amount of pixels placed).

Rewards for painters are: - 96.1% of value after selling the artwork on an auction - 6.1% every time the artwork is sold

Try Crypto Canvas, maybe you are The Blockchain Picasso!

results.name: EtherGalaxies
results.description: Invade EtherGalaxies planets and win massive ETH b
results.fullDescription: Invade EtherGalaxies planets and win massive ETH bounties!? Invade mysterious planets in the infinite cosmos of EtherGalaxies. Keep your eyes peeled for the space villain “Handa Bandita” who is currently in hiding after his latest Ethereum heist. ? This pesky villain will take his share of any invasion that happens in EtherGalaxies. If you succeed in capturing him you’ll earn his massive bounty as a reward! ? Each planet increases its value each time it has been invaded but can only be owned by one user at a time. You can rename the planets and add your touch to them. There are thousands of different planets, each with their own type, race, and population. The villain called “Handa Bandita” takes a small amount of each invasion and that is added to his HUGE ETH bounty. If you succeed in capturing him you'll earn the WHOLE bounty as a reward!

results.name: TheButton
results.description: This is a take on the popular Reddit experiment th
results.fullDescription: This is a take on the popular Reddit experiment the button, but with a few key differences. At the core, this button is based on an Ethereum smart contract. There’s a countdown timer — when the button is pressed the timer resets (just like the original). Anyone can press the button as many times as they want, but it costs ether to press it. The last presser wins the accumulated ether as a jackpot!

results.description: Crypto Battlegrounds is the first battle royale on
results.fullDescription: Crypto Battlegrounds is the first battle royale on the blockchain. Fight against up to 25 opponents in a free-for-all Battle Royale that gives players the chance to win 0.107ETH each round. Start with only your fists and scavenge the map for supplies and weapons to give you an edge on your opponents. Become one of the last 3 survivors to claim the pot.

results.name: Coin Mirror
results.description: We built CoinMirror to fulfill the promise of demo
results.fullDescription: We built CoinMirror to fulfill the promise of democratized investing. Good quality ICO investment opportunities are rare and hard to find. By allowing regular people to essentially co-invest with credible investors, we can manage some risk, and provide access to great deals at the earliest possible stages.
